title: Personal Blog is Finalized
body: I've added all the features I wanted on my blog, next I'll look into developing a real-time messaging platform, with an emphasis on security, privacy, and anonymity

title: Getting AWS Certified
body: I've begun pursuing certifications from AWS, so first I'll become a Certified Cloud Practicioner. Afterwards, I'll begin preparing for either the AWS Developer Certificate or AWS Certified Solutions Architect.

title: Finishing Up My blog
body: I've mostly completed my blog, however I would like to add a page for my resume or maybe certifications.
